error.maxNumber: Number can not be greater then {{LIMIT}}.

selected.caption: Here you can switch between your wallets and manage funds.

dapp.caption: Here you can switch your dapp account.

ui.caption: Here you can select your account to use.

error.notReadable: Is the camera already in use?
error.streamApiNotSupported: Stream API is not supported in this browser.
error.insecureContext: Camera access is only permitted in secure context. Use HTTPS or localhost rather than HTTP.

bex.fullscreenNotice:
Please open the extension in fullscreen mode to allow camera access. This only has to be done once.

assetname.hover: Copy Asset Name in hex format

utxo.headline: Account UTxO List
utxo.caption: A list of all utxos under management of this account, including amount and token lists.
utxo.label: {{utxo_count}} UTxO on {{address_count}} addresses

collateral.label: {{utxo_count}} possible collateral UTxOs available, not all are set as collateral

token.headline: Token list
token.caption: Here you can see your Cardano native assets, tokens, NFTs and FTs.
token.notokens: Currently this wallet does not contain any tokens. If you expect tokens, please check whether the wallet is still syncing.
token.filterEmpty: No tokens found with metadata matching search string input and selected type.
token.nometadata: No metadata found for this token. Enable "Detailed mode" for basic details.
token.label: @:common.assets.token

ipfs.loading: Please wait, the asset is being loaded.
ipfs.error: Error loading data from ipfs, please retry or contact support.
ipfs.timeout: Download of file timed out, please retry or contact support.

hover.nometa: Loading metadata, input disabled and decimals unknown until completed!

search.label: Filter tokens
search.info: Search for tokens based on policy, fingerprint, name, ticker and other metadata. Semicolon can be used as a separator to input multiple search values.

error.length: A minimum of 3 characters needed to filter tokens.

milkomeda.filtered: "Note": Only tokens that can be bridged to milkomeda are shown.
milkomeda.noAssetsOnMainnet: "Note": Milkomeda currently does not support sending assets on mainnet.
milkomeda.countAddition: from which ###COUNT### can be bridged to milkomeda.
milkomeda.tokenLimit: A transaction to Milkomeda can only include one kind of token.
milkomeda.sendAll: Consider moving all token but one to another address before using send all.
milkomeda.invalidToken: Your wallet includes a token that can not be bridged to Milkomeda.

portfolio.label: Portfolio
portfolio.caption: Overview over the value of assets in this account.
portfolio.description: These numbers are estimates of the value of tokens in your wallet. The values are only updated every 5 Minutes and the price is an aggregation of different decentralizes exchanges.
